snippet: KEYBL--Jaroslav. Born November 11, 1927, passed away on May 11, at his home in Flushing, NY. Czech journalist, manager at Lufthansa and lifelong learner. Survived by his wife Marie and two sons. 1/3
lead_paragraph: KEYBL--Jaroslav. Born November 11, 1927, passed away on May 11, at his home in Flushing, NY. Czech journalist, manager at Lufthansa and lifelong learner. Survived by his wife Marie and two sons. 1/3
